text.div:
Event Related Period

CodeDescriptionCommentVersion
AC before meal (from lat. ante cibus)added v2.5
ACD before lunch (from lat. ante cibus diurnus)added v2.5
ACM before breakfast (from lat. ante cibus matutinus)added v2.5
ACV before dinner (from lat. ante cibus vespertinus)added v2.5
HS the hour of sleep (e.g. H18-22)added v2.5
IC between meals (from lat. inter cibus)added v2.5
ICD between lunch and dinneradded v2.5
ICM between breakfast and lunchadded v2.5
ICV between dinner and the hour of sleepadded v2.5
PC after meal (from lat. post cibus)added v2.5
PCD after lunch (from lat. post cibus diurnus)added v2.5
PCM after breakfast (from lat. post cibus matutinus)added v2.5
PCV after dinner (from lat. post cibus vespertinus)added v2.5

name: v2 Event Related Period
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0528 ( Event Related Period)
